document_data.name: ''Tears of Eternity''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tears of Eternity''''' was a unique enchanted blade found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: ''Tears of Eternity'' was a [[scimitar]] that functioned as a ''[[sword of wounding]]''.
document_data.History: This [[sword]] was carried by [[Khaizuran]], a [[warmonger genie]] who worked for the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]].
